trans-unit.source: Troubleshoot the BizTalk Adapter Service
trans-unit.target: Troubleshoot the BizTalk Adapter Service

trans-unit.source: Enable tracing and performance counters in the <token>lobconnect</token>.
trans-unit.target: Enable tracing and performance counters in the <token>lobconnect</token>.

trans-unit.source: The <legacyBold><token>lobconnect</token> Runtime</legacyBold> and <legacyBold><token>lobconnect</token> Management</legacyBold> components use the .Net Framework System.Diagnostics trace source and the XML Trace Listener.
trans-unit.target: The <legacyBold><token>lobconnect</token> Runtime</legacyBold> and <legacyBold><token>lobconnect</token> Management</legacyBold> components use the .Net Framework System.Diagnostics trace source and the XML Trace Listener.

trans-unit.source: In a <token>lobconnect</token> Runtime Application, tracing events can be enabled for the <legacyBold><token>lobconnect</token> Runtime</legacyBold> and <legacyBold><token>lobconnect</token> Management</legacyBold> components.
trans-unit.target: In a <token>lobconnect</token> Runtime Application, tracing events can be enabled for the <legacyBold><token>lobconnect</token> Runtime</legacyBold> and <legacyBold><token>lobconnect</token> Management</legacyBold> components.

trans-unit.source: To enable runtime tracing
trans-unit.target: To enable runtime tracing

trans-unit.source: Go to the Microsoft <token>lobconnect</token> Runtime folder.
trans-unit.target: Go to the Microsoft <token>lobconnect</token> Runtime folder.

trans-unit.source: By default, the folder is <legacyItalic>C:\Program Files\Microsoft <token>lobconnect</token>\BAServiceRuntime</legacyItalic>.
trans-unit.target: By default, the folder is <legacyItalic>C:\Program Files\Microsoft <token>lobconnect</token>\BAServiceRuntime</legacyItalic>.

trans-unit.source: Open the <embeddedLabel>web.config</embeddedLabel> file in Notepad.
trans-unit.target: Open the <embeddedLabel>web.config</embeddedLabel> file in Notepad.

trans-unit.source: In the <embeddedLabel><configuration></embeddedLabel> node, add the following <embeddedLabel><system.diagnostics></embeddedLabel> section:
trans-unit.target: In the <embeddedLabel><configuration></embeddedLabel> node, add the following <embeddedLabel><system.diagnostics></embeddedLabel> section:

trans-unit.source: The trace file name and location can be any name and path you prefer.
trans-unit.target: The trace file name and location can be any name and path you prefer.

trans-unit.source: In the <sharedListeners> section above, RuntimeTraceFile.xml is the trace file name and is created in the c:\temp folder.
trans-unit.target: In the <sharedListeners> section above, RuntimeTraceFile.xml is the trace file name and is created in the c:\temp folder.

trans-unit.source: Within the <embeddedLabel><system.servicemodel></embeddedLabel> node inside the web.config, add the following <embeddedLabel><diagnostics></embeddedLabel> section:
trans-unit.target: Within the <embeddedLabel><system.servicemodel></embeddedLabel> node inside the web.config, add the following <embeddedLabel><diagnostics></embeddedLabel> section:

trans-unit.source: Save changes to the web.config.
trans-unit.target: Save changes to the web.config.

trans-unit.source: To enable management tracing
trans-unit.target: To enable management tracing

trans-unit.source: Go to the Microsoft <token>lobconnect</token> Management folder.
trans-unit.target: Go to the Microsoft <token>lobconnect</token> Management folder.

trans-unit.source: By default, the folder is <legacyItalic>C:\Program Files\Microsoft <token>lobconnect</token>\BAService</legacyItalic>.
trans-unit.target: By default, the folder is <legacyItalic>C:\Program Files\Microsoft <token>lobconnect</token>\BAService</legacyItalic>.

trans-unit.source: Open the web.config file in Notepad.
trans-unit.target: Open the web.config file in Notepad.

trans-unit.source: In the <embeddedLabel><configuration></embeddedLabel> section, add the following <embeddedLabel><system.diagnostics></embeddedLabel> section:
trans-unit.target: In the <embeddedLabel><configuration></embeddedLabel> section, add the following <embeddedLabel><system.diagnostics></embeddedLabel> section:

trans-unit.source: The trace file name and location can be any name and path you prefer.
trans-unit.target: The trace file name and location can be any name and path you prefer.

trans-unit.source: In the <sharedListeners> section above, ManagementTraceFile.xml is the trace file name and i created in the c:\temp folder.
trans-unit.target: In the <sharedListeners> section above, ManagementTraceFile.xml is the trace file name and i created in the c:\temp folder.

trans-unit.source: Within the <embeddedLabel><system.servicemodel></embeddedLabel> node inside the web.config, add the following <embeddedLabel><diagnostics></embeddedLabel> section:
trans-unit.target: Within the <embeddedLabel><system.servicemodel></embeddedLabel> node inside the web.config, add the following <embeddedLabel><diagnostics></embeddedLabel> section:

trans-unit.source: Save changes to the web.config.
trans-unit.target: Save changes to the web.config.

trans-unit.source: Supported switchValue options
trans-unit.target: Supported switchValue options

trans-unit.source: <token>lobconnect</token> supports the following <legacyBold>switchValue</legacyBold> options:
trans-unit.target: <token>lobconnect</token> supports the following <legacyBold>switchValue</legacyBold> options:

trans-unit.source: Off
trans-unit.target: Off

trans-unit.source: Critical
trans-unit.target: Critical

trans-unit.source: Error
trans-unit.target: Error

trans-unit.source: Warning
trans-unit.target: Warning

trans-unit.source: Information
trans-unit.target: Information

trans-unit.source: Verbose
trans-unit.target: Verbose

trans-unit.source: ActivityTracing
trans-unit.target: ActivityTracing

trans-unit.source: All
trans-unit.target: All

trans-unit.source: <externalLink><linkText>Configuring Tracing</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=193433</linkUri></externalLink> lists the tracked events of the different Tracing levels.
trans-unit.target: <externalLink><linkText>Configuring Tracing</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=193433</linkUri></externalLink> lists the tracked events of the different Tracing levels.

trans-unit.source: To enable Performance Monitor counters
trans-unit.target: To enable Performance Monitor counters

trans-unit.source: The <legacyBold><token>lobconnect</token> Runtime</legacyBold> and <legacyBold><token>lobconnect</token> Management</legacyBold> components utilize Performance Monitor.
trans-unit.target: The <legacyBold><token>lobconnect</token> Runtime</legacyBold> and <legacyBold><token>lobconnect</token> Management</legacyBold> components utilize Performance Monitor.

trans-unit.source: By default, these performance counters are enabled.
trans-unit.target: By default, these performance counters are enabled.

trans-unit.source: To enable or disable the Management performance counters:
trans-unit.target: To enable or disable the Management performance counters:

trans-unit.source: In IIS, expand <legacyBold>Sites</legacyBold>, and expand <legacyBold><token>lobconnect</token></legacyBold>.
trans-unit.target: In IIS, expand <legacyBold>Sites</legacyBold>, and expand <legacyBold><token>lobconnect</token></legacyBold>.

trans-unit.source: Select the <legacyBold>BAService</legacyBold> application and select <embeddedLabel>Application Settings</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: Select the <legacyBold>BAService</legacyBold> application and select <embeddedLabel>Application Settings</embeddedLabel>.

trans-unit.source: To enable the performance counters, set <embeddedLabel>EnablePerfCounter</embeddedLabel> to True.
trans-unit.target: To enable the performance counters, set <embeddedLabel>EnablePerfCounter</embeddedLabel> to True.

trans-unit.source: To disable the performance counters, set <embeddedLabel>EnablePerfCounter</embeddedLabel> to False.
trans-unit.target: To disable the performance counters, set <embeddedLabel>EnablePerfCounter</embeddedLabel> to False.

trans-unit.source: Performance counters can also be enabled in the web.config file (<legacyItalic>\Program Files\Microsoft <token>lobconnect</token>\BAService</legacyItalic>):
trans-unit.target: Performance counters can also be enabled in the web.config file (<legacyItalic>\Program Files\Microsoft <token>lobconnect</token>\BAService</legacyItalic>):

trans-unit.source: When enabled, the <embeddedLabel><token>lobconnect</token> Management</embeddedLabel> object is available in Performance Monitor with the following counters:
trans-unit.target: When enabled, the <embeddedLabel><token>lobconnect</token> Management</embeddedLabel> object is available in Performance Monitor with the following counters:

trans-unit.source: AverageTimeToCreateRelay
trans-unit.target: AverageTimeToCreateRelay

trans-unit.source: AverageTimeToCreateTarget
trans-unit.target: AverageTimeToCreateTarget

trans-unit.source: AverageTimeToDeleteRelay
trans-unit.target: AverageTimeToDeleteRelay

trans-unit.source: AverageTimeToDeleteTarget
trans-unit.target: AverageTimeToDeleteTarget

trans-unit.source: AverageTimeToUpdateRelay
trans-unit.target: AverageTimeToUpdateRelay

trans-unit.source: AverageTimeToUpdateTarget
trans-unit.target: AverageTimeToUpdateTarget

trans-unit.source: To enable or disable the Runtime performance counters:
trans-unit.target: To enable or disable the Runtime performance counters:

trans-unit.source: In IIS, expand <legacyBold>Sites</legacyBold> and expand <legacyBold><token>lobconnect</token></legacyBold>.
trans-unit.target: In IIS, expand <legacyBold>Sites</legacyBold> and expand <legacyBold><token>lobconnect</token></legacyBold>.

trans-unit.source: Select the application that corresponds to the relay and select <embeddedLabel>Application Settings</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: Select the application that corresponds to the relay and select <embeddedLabel>Application Settings</embeddedLabel>.

trans-unit.source: To enable the performance counters, set <embeddedLabel>EnablePerfCounter</embeddedLabel> to True.
trans-unit.target: To enable the performance counters, set <embeddedLabel>EnablePerfCounter</embeddedLabel> to True.

trans-unit.source: To disable the performance counters, set <embeddedLabel>EnablePerfCounter</embeddedLabel> to False.
trans-unit.target: To disable the performance counters, set <embeddedLabel>EnablePerfCounter</embeddedLabel> to False.

trans-unit.source: Performance counters can also be enabled in the web.config file (<legacyItalic>\Program Files\Microsoft <token>lobconnect</token>\BAServiceRuntime</legacyItalic>):
trans-unit.target: Performance counters can also be enabled in the web.config file (<legacyItalic>\Program Files\Microsoft <token>lobconnect</token>\BAServiceRuntime</legacyItalic>):

trans-unit.source: When enabled, the <embeddedLabel><token>lobconnect</token> Runtime</embeddedLabel> object is available in Performance Monitor with the following counters:
trans-unit.target: When enabled, the <embeddedLabel><token>lobconnect</token> Runtime</embeddedLabel> object is available in Performance Monitor with the following counters:

trans-unit.source: AverageTimeToOpenChannel
trans-unit.target: AverageTimeToOpenChannel

trans-unit.source: AverageTimeToSend
trans-unit.target: AverageTimeToSend

trans-unit.source: Runtime URL: Unable to connect
trans-unit.target: Runtime URL: Unable to connect

trans-unit.source: During the <token>lobconnect</token> installation, you choose whether to allow SSL connections.
trans-unit.target: During the <token>lobconnect</token> installation, you choose whether to allow SSL connections.

trans-unit.source: The Runtime URL automatically defaults to HTTP or HTTPS depending on your SSL choice.
trans-unit.target: The Runtime URL automatically defaults to HTTP or HTTPS depending on your SSL choice.

trans-unit.source: In some scenarios, you may be unable to connect to the Runtime URL.
trans-unit.target: In some scenarios, you may be unable to connect to the Runtime URL.

trans-unit.source: In the following scenarios, you may need to change from the default HTTP/HTTPS setting:
trans-unit.target: In the following scenarios, you may need to change from the default HTTP/HTTPS setting:

trans-unit.source: You installed the <token>lobconnect</token> with the no SSL option.
trans-unit.target: You installed the <token>lobconnect</token> with the no SSL option.

trans-unit.source: From another computer, you connect to the Runtime URL.
trans-unit.target: From another computer, you connect to the Runtime URL.

trans-unit.source: In this scenario, you must enter HTTP for the Runtime URL:
trans-unit.target: In this scenario, you must enter HTTP for the Runtime URL:

trans-unit.source: http://<legacyItalic>ServerName</legacyItalic>:8080/BAService/ManagementService.svc/
trans-unit.target: http://<legacyItalic>ServerName</legacyItalic>:8080/BAService/ManagementService.svc/

trans-unit.source: You installed the <token>lobconnect</token> locally and allowed SSL connections.
trans-unit.target: You installed the <token>lobconnect</token> locally and allowed SSL connections.

trans-unit.source: You reinstall the <token>lobconnect</token> and don’t allow SSL connections.
trans-unit.target: You reinstall the <token>lobconnect</token> and don’t allow SSL connections.

trans-unit.source: In this scenario, you must enter HTTP for the Runtime URL:
trans-unit.target: In this scenario, you must enter HTTP for the Runtime URL:

trans-unit.source: http://localhost:8080/BAService/ManagementService.svc/
trans-unit.target: http://localhost:8080/BAService/ManagementService.svc/

trans-unit.source: Windows Performance Monitor
trans-unit.target: Windows Performance Monitor
